title: Seaweed walk
creator_credit: Barry Cowling, Rex Tasker and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A group of people take advantage of a unique program sponsored by the Nova Scotia Museum. Bus tours led by a botanist visit the seashore, where the visitors are encouraged to identify the many varieties of seaweed. The guide describes the biological characteristics and commercial uses of the marine plants.
